Mozilla M11 Release

17 Nov 1999

Milestone 11 of Mozilla has been released. You can browse the release notes or download the latest binaries or source code.

New features in this release are support for proxies, limited CSS2, and on the fly changes to the chrome! Once again, hats off to the Mozilla team.
